name: Pixelorama Project
summary: Learn about .PXO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Pixelorama allows you to create sprites, tiles, and animations for expressive purposes or as graphical resources in a game or app. The software is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux and can run in a web browser.
When you save your project to preserve your editing progress, Pixelorama saves it as a PXO file by default. Once saved, you can close and re-open the project to continue editing.
NOTE: Pixelorama compresses PXO files with ZSTD compression if the creator chooses the "Use ZSTD Compression" option when saving the PXO project.

instructions: You can open a PXO file with Orama Interactive Pixelorama in Windows, macOS, Linux, and a web browser. To do so, select File → Open.
Pixelorama can convert PXO files to the following formats when you select File → Export:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
